short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity with an interesting home page that organises bookmarks, motivation, weather and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of staring at a boring new tab in your browser?

Introducing a new Chrome extension that will completely change your new tab experience.

Extensions allow you to personalize your home screen with widgets such as weather forecast, to-do list and clock in one convenient place.

There's also an easy access bookmarks bar so you can easily navigate to your favorite websites.

That's not all. Our extension also offers live wallpapers that will add beauty and inspiration to your new tab.
Imagine a beautiful animated landscape as your new tab background.
